mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon_registration ( COUPON_CODE, USER_ID, TERRITORY_ID, WINNER, SUBMISSION_TS, CRE_TS, MOD_TS, VERSION) VALUES ( #{couponCode}, #{user.userId}, #{territory.territoryId},#{winner},#{submissionTs},current_timestamp,current_timestamp,0)
mapper.update: UPDATE coupon_registration ( set WINNER = #{winner}, MOD_TS = current_timestamp, VERSION = VERSION +1) where registration_id = #{registrationId} and VERSION = VERSION;
mapper.select: SELECT registration_id, coupon_code, user_id, territory_id, winner, submission_ts, t.nr_balls_per_day, t.nr_balls_per_campaign, t.vinning_rate, u.first_name, u.last_name, u.birth_date, u.email_address from coupon_registration c, territories t, users u where c.territory_id = t.territory_id and u.user_id = c.user_id and coupon_code = #{couponCode}
